ValidationRule.description: Add "Flat Rate Percentage" option to "Revenue Share" field on the opportunity object in the section titled "Business Development Tool (BDT) and Financial Information"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordTypeId = "012E0000000fK7P", ISPICKVAL (Revenue_Share__c, "Flat Rate Percentage"), ISBLANK (Flat_Rate_Percentage__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please input percentage value in "Flat Rate Percentage" field
